item.title: Turn to npc
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

how do i refer to another.java file because i was trying to make my npc turn around and the turn to npc void is in NPC.java. how do i make it so i can make it into NPCHandler.java or how can i put it in my code?

ex: if (newNPC.npcType == NPCID) {
if ((newNPC.absX == CoordX) && (newNPC.absY == CoordY)) {
newNPC.TurnNpcTo(newNPC.absX + 2, newNPC.absY);
}
}

i dont have a newNPC.TurnNpcTo in my NPCHandler.java

Read full topic
